level.text: Property shall be closed to the public during other than normal working hours, except in specific instances in which OPM has issued a permit for use after normal working hours.
The decisions to close a property on an emergency basis shall be made by the Director, OPM. This action by the Director may be coordinated with affected District agency officials.
When property or a portion thereof is closed, admission shall be restricted to authorized persons who shall do the following when requested:
Sign a register upon entry; and
Display government or other identifying credentials to Protective Services officials or other authorized individuals.
